tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_heading: Got to know a new places with a great views
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: Would highly recommend this tour such a great experience had soo much fun it was a smooth ride kind guy
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Noor,nnThank you so much for these nice words and your recommendation! It really was great fun, I'm glad you liked it. nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: Great tour. The scenery was really nice and Kenan taught us a lot about Bosnian history. Highly recommended.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Daniel,nnThank you so much for these kind words, it means a lot to me. You were such a great group, I really enjoyed spending time with you. Please send my regards to your lady friends.nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: I never went to Srebrenica before, really needed to see it during my lifetime. That's why I decided to take official guide and I can tell you it was a right decision. Kenan made me feel everything the right way. Thank you so much for everything. Highly recommended to everyone!
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Adi,nnI'm really honored to hear these words. It was my pleasure meeting you and explaining everything to a local. It was a great privilege to meet you and exchange thoughts on the subject as well as to see things from your perspective. nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: Really great experience & really great guide!
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear David,nnI was so happy to make you and Bianca feel at home. Thank you so much for your recommendation! Please send my regards to your girlfriend!nnTill next time,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: You cannot go wrong with this tour company.  I had Kenan as my tour guide.  A straight up sincere, knowledgeable and service minded bloke.  Anticipating and sensitive to any whim I had, accommodating for the parts of the itinerary that was more interesting to me.  The tour itself was of course a somber experience but a lighthearted conversation in the car added some counterweight to that.  He *really* went out of his way to make my stay a memorable one.  This was the highlight of my trip.  I would travel again with Kenan in a heartbeat!
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Trond,nnWow, thank you sincerely. I'm really honored to hear these words. It was my pleasure meeting you, thank you for such a detailed recommendation. I know that genocide is a somber subject as you said, and I was more than happy to anticipate everything for you. Thank you for enjoying that 'lighthearted conversation' as you said, that is the most beautiful part of the tour, to meet new people and get to know them! I can't wait to tour with you again as well! We shall meet in Switzerland and do the paragliding together as agreed for sure!nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: Perfect guy that gives very good treatment.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Serdal,nnThank you so much for these kind words, it means a lot to me. It was my pleasure to help you. nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: It was my first time to do a photoshoot and it felt awkward at first but as we progressed we managed to complete the photoshoot with Hanna's assistance.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Ronnie,nnThank you so much for these kind words, I'm happy that you really loved and enjoyed the tour even though it was awkward for you in the beginning. Hana is brilliant and it's perfect that you were able to relax toward the end.nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_heading: Tour jajce and travnik with Ken
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: The tour in travnik and jajce was amazing, especially the kebab place, special thanks to our guide Ken!
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Redouane,nnThank you so much for these kind words, it means a lot to me, I'm very humbled and happy I was able to make you fall in love with my country :) I loved our discussions and I wish we had more time on a tour. Lunch is a story for itself, we won't mention it here, since I usually don't give any recommendations, but this one is a must in Bosnia :)nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: To be honest we were doubting if we would do this tour because of the impact and it's not the typical tour to do on a holiday.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Bianca,nnI'm really speechless. It was my pleasure meeting you and your husband, thank you for such a detailed recommendation. I know that genocide is a delicate subject and this tour is not really a typical holiday tour as you said, but we handled it well together and I'm happy you felt comfortable during the entire tour. I wish I met you before as well to do some tours together, but this is also nice and I will cherish it forever. Thanks a million!nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: October 2022
tripAdvisorTestimonials.date_of_stay: First of all Bosnia and Herzegovina u r so beautiful as a nation. Thank u for having me🙏 I wish more and more people know what this beautiful country has to offer. My guide named Kenan made this tour a memorable one for me. Through out the tour his conversations engaging and we talked a lot about in general about other aspects of life as well. This made it even more wonderful. He is extremely friendly and a highly cheerful person. He made sure that I enjoy every bit of my tour and helped in taking photos of the tour which will be a treasured memory for me. I had a great time in the lap of nature. I highly recommend this tour both for the splendid beauty that this tour will offer and also for Kenan who will make sure that one has an amazing tour. Namaste and love from a happy Indian tourist 🙏❣️
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Roopal,nnBosnia was more than welcome to have you :) Thank you so much for these kind words and recommendations, it means a lot to me. I'm very humbled and happy I was able to make you fall in love with my country. It was my pleasure taking photos and videos for you, glad you liked it. Would love to see you doing some yoga retreat in Bosnia soon as we discussed :)nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnNamaste from a happy Bosnian tour guide,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_heading: A really enjoyable visit to a dark place
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: A great experience! Kenan was super helpful and everything was great with the visit. Id definitely recommend it.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Eduardo,nnI'm really honored to hear these words. Thank you for this recommendation, I know it's your first time and I really appreciate it. I wish you will leave many more reviews in the future :) I'm glad you had a great experience in Srebrenica, even though it is a tough subject.nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: Great tour. The scenery was really nice and Kenan taught us a lot about Bosnian history. Highly recommended.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Daniel,nnThank you so much for these kind words, it means a lot to me. You were such a great group, I really enjoyed spending time with you. Please send my regards to your lady friends.nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: Kenan was amazing(helpful,friendy) and this is our best tour this year,we hope we will come back next year to same place with same guide. Mostar is trully amazing city with rich history, and Kenan made sure we understand it fully. Recommended for everyone visiting Bosnia and Herzegovina.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Hey Haris, thank you for the kind words. You were an amazing guest, I hope to see you soon. nnWarm regards,nB&H Adventure team

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: I have been mostar many times but this was best one. 👍 guide knows best places to eat. best spots to visit. also he is very gentle.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Ismail, thank you for your kind words. We're delighted you had such a good time with us. Hope to see you again someday soon. nnBest wishes,nB&H Adventure Team

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: Excellent tourguide who drives us to our destination very safe and comfortable. Especially the tour to soccergame  Bosnia against Lichtenstein in Zenica  was a highlight. We highly recommend him!!!
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Mirza, I had so much fun with you and your friends, thank you for this experience as well 😁 See you next year hopefully!

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: Excellent experience!!! We did a long trip from Sarajevo to Budapest by car. The guide was excellent and solve us a huge problem, because our flight was cancelled.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Jaime, we were delighted to help you. Glad you had a great experience with us, hope to see you again someday. Feel free to contact us for anything!nnCheers,nB&H Adventure team

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_heading: One of the best trips ever
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: This tour was suggested to us by our hotel team as we were a big family of 7 we went with Kenan in a mini van  and he was an extremely nice and fun tour guide. After the trip we ended up spending the next two days on other trips with Kenan where he should us some really amazing places around sarajevo that we would not even dream of seeing without a professional local guide. I would highly recommend B&H especially for families because of how helpful they were.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Hey Yasmin, so glad we've met. Cause otherwise, I wouldn't be able to meet you and your amazing family, especially Zizu. We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed Sarajevo and B&H with us. Hope to see you again someday, would love to host you again in our country. nnP.S. - I really like the picture you posted. Please send my regards to Zizu, I miss him a lot :)nnGood luck and warm regards,nB&H Adventure team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: The tour was amazing and I’m so glad I went on it especially since I had limited time in the country. The sites were great but Kenan the tour guide really added flavour to the tour by telling me about the history, culture, and current affairs of Bosnia and Herzegovina. Should not be missed if you’re visiting, especially if you’re short on time.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Hey Nyda, I had such a great time with you. I'm glad that you could learn more about this country and its people and history. We hope to see you again someday!!nnBest wishes,nB&H Adventure team

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: Its my first time in sarajevo and i met kenan there, and i haven’t thought that i would ever find a trip guider as agood a him. He was really professional and took me and my family to the best possible places that i wouldnt thought i would see there and felt that he was part of our family because we spent the whole day together. I really enjoyed the time in sarajevo accompanied with him and i hope i will visit the city more often and get to know more about it with kenan. The best tour guide ever ❤️
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Sajad, I really feel like you are my brother <3. You truly have a beautiful family, I wish you all the best in life. So happy I could show you the way of life we have here in Sarajevo and that you're so eager to come again. You are most welcome, we'll go paragliding next time definitely.nnUntil next time,nB&H Adventure team

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_heading: Very professional and very friendly guide
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: We were in sarajevo for two days and went with kenan for this tour and he made it a really great tour with all the info and the history that he was telling us about. Also, he was nice enough to take us to some places outside the itenary to give us more details about the stories behind the history of sarajevo.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Hassan, thank you for these kind words, it really means a lot to me. I felt a really strong connection between us since our countries (Iraq and B&H) had a similar history. Glad you enjoyed the tour, we would love you to come back someday to Bosnia and Herzegovina! See you again hopefully!nnRegards,nB&H Adventure team

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: Kenan did an incredible job immersing us into the experience of Sarajevo under siege and what time during the war must have been like. It helped us understand, as much as it can be understood through a tour, what the citizens of Sarajevo must have gone through in the longest siege in military history. Thank you Kenan for this sobering, but incredible experience.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Hey Delila, you're most welcome. I'm glad you the opportunity to witness it 'first hand' and to feel the atmosphere from different periods of our history. Hope to see you again someday!

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: We took a private tour for two. The tour guide was so helpful and friendly. He could adjust the tour plan based on our interests. Highly recommended
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Ferda,nthank you. Hope you had an amazing time with us, especially on Kravice waterfall. We would love to see you again someday. Good luck!

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: This was such a great tour. Highly recommend, I’m glad I went. Emina Koso was my guide. She was so nice and helpful.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Jay,nnThank you so much for these kind words and your recommendation, so happy to hear this. Emina is a great guide, I'm happy you experienced her in the right way. Hope to see you someday again.nnWish you all the best, stay safe!nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_heading: Glad I went after being on the fence!
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: When planning my trip to Bosnia, I was hesitant to  book this tour, wondering if it would be worth it. I’m very pleased I did. It’s an off the beaten path tour, showing you unique sites that are relevant to medieval Bosnia and then seeing the linkage back to current times. Visually, you get a taste of what Bosnia looks like on the drive through the country to reach your destinations. It’s stunning!
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Hamida,nnThank you so much for these kind words. I really had an awesome time with you on this tour. Thank you for enjoying the sights and my explanations, it really means a lot to me :) Glad Bosnia will stay in your mind as a stunning country. nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: Great tour. The scenery was really nice and Kenan taught us a lot about Bosnian history. Highly recommended.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Daniel,nnThank you so much for these kind words, it means a lot to me. You were such a great group, I really enjoyed spending time with you. tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_heading: Got to know a new places with a great views
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: Would highly recommend this tour such a great experience had soo much fun it was a smooth ride kind guy
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Noor,nnThank you so much for these nice words and your recommendation! It really was great fun, I'm glad you liked it. nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: It has been an amazing day with Kenan  a new prespective of Bosnia even though it is my second visit 👌 highley recommended tour that should not be missed
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Shaikha,nnThank you so much for these nice words. I'm very happy to hear you enjoyed Bosnia from another perspective! Third time's a charm, so you definitely have to come back!nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: I have been on group and private tours on 3 continents, and this is by far the best I have experienced.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Michael,nnWow. I couldn't be happier to hear these lovely words and recommendations, didn't know I was the best on 3 continents (haha), thanks! I couldn't be more proud of the fact I made you feel right at home, that's the whole point of everything I do. I'm so glad that you experienced Bosnia (and Herzegovina) with me and that we became friends at the end of the tour, that was a highlight for me. Send my regards to Gauri, you two are such a sweet couple! I will be waiting for you, see you again in March.nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: This review starts and ends with the fact that it's the best tour in Bosnia that you could go on simply because you will have the best tour guide, Kenan. My partner and I went on this day tour with Kenan and he showed us the real Bosnia and Herzegovina with all of its magic and local hidden spots that we certainly couldn't have found ourselves, and I doubt any other tour guide could give you the same experience -- I can say, having been on many tours in many countries, we haven't had a more fun, relaxing, and also adventure-filled day! We got to learn tons about the rich history of Bosnia, its current-day identity and walked away with a much more nuanced perspective of a country that has seen so much and has such a diverse population. Every location on the tour has tons to add and Kenan connected all the different significances beautifully. To top it off, we really enjoyed just chatting with him about his perspectives on Bosnia and even life, and I'm happy to say walked away with not just a great tour, but also a friend :)  Book this tour!! (and he takes great pictures!)
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Gauri,nnWhat a wonderful feeling to hear something like this. Truly a blessing. I wanted to address every single thing you mentioned in this review, but I don't want to spoil it so I will just say thank you from the bottom of my heart. I love the fact that we became friends on this tour, that is the most wonderful thing anyone can ask for and that is the reason why I love what I do. Thanks!nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: “Let’s be honest”, I love this tour. Keno is a great tourguide. He is enthusiastic, dedicated and caring tourguide who helped us to fully enjoy the trip. We have come to visit the waterfall, Pliva watermills and castle. Keno brought us to a great restaurant where we can enjoy the best Cevapi in Sarajevo. Even though the weather is raining but my BF and I had a great day.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Thuong,nn'Let's be honest' hahaha. I didn't even realize I use it that much, I'll definitely make it my official catchphrase. I'm very humbled and happy you enjoyed Bosnia with me, the rain didn't stop us from having a great time :) Glad you loved those Cevapi since I usually don't like to give any recommendations, but this one is a must-try in Bosnia! Thank you so much for your recommendation, it means a lot to us (me).nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: Ken was very attentive, fun to be around and taught us a lot about Bosnia and took us to the best Ćevapi restaurant on the way back from the waterfall. I would say seeing the waterfall was the best part of the tour! Thanks Ken!
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Josh,nnThank you so much for this awesome recommendation. I'm very humbled and happy you enjoyed Bosnia with me, I had a lot of you and your girlfriend! Glad you loved Cevapi and waterfall, it is a blessing. Now you know a bit more about Bosnia, which is perfect :)nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: Beatiful city and river. Ken is a very helpful and knowledgable guide. Would recommend to everyone :).
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Mes,nnI'm happy to hear you loved all the cities we visited, Neretva is such a beautiful river indeed. It was my pleasure meeting and guiding you. Thank you so much for everything!nnHope to see you again someday. Stay safe!nnTill next time,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_heading: A must seen when visiting Bosnia!
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: The day tour with Ken was spectacular! Highly recommend if you want to learn Bosnian history and culture, and also try delicious typical food! Landscape was beautiful during the fall! You can really take great pictures (Ken is an expert on that too!). Ken is very knowledgeable about history which keeps you very engaged and interested; and he is also very kind and sensitive which makes you feel really comfortable.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Sofia,nnWow, what can I say? I felt really comfortable with you too. Also, I'm very humbled and happy I was able to make you fall in love with my country, especially during fall :) Taking photos is my passion and I'm happy you have some cool memories to share with your friends and family. Feeling blessed, thank you!nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_heading: Engaging and personal tour filled with fun facts and new sights.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: Ken is a really engaging, knowledgeable, and experienced tour guide- definitely recommend! You’ll see another side of Bosnia and get a complete a story of the country and it’s different periods, told in a very personal way, and with good food on the way! Ken also has great recommendations and, above all, a really engaging personality that will make the experience very enjoyable.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Andrea,nnThank you so much for these kind words, it means a lot to me, I'm very humbled and happy I was able to make you engage and enjoy in Bosnia :) I loved our discussions and that personal touch is something I like to emphasize, thanks for appreciating it. Lunch is a story for itself, we won't mention it here, since I usually don't like to give any recommendations, but this one is a must in Bosnia :)nnHope to see you again someday! Stay safe.nnWarm regards,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.

tripAdvisorTestimonials.name: Adventure in Bosnia Tours
tripAdvisorTestimonials.review_body: This was the best day and highly recommend the tour and our stellar guide, Kenan Causevic! Kenan was incredibly friendly and build rapport with our diverse group, so that we felt like family by the end. The sights and places we visited are truly magical and inspiring, but what made it especially so was Kenan's vast knowledge and insights...he fielded a diversity of questions with tremendous local knowledge and perspectives...we got much more than just a 'canned' tour, but one very personalized to our interests. Kenan was very attentive to our interests and needs and modified the trip schedule to meet our group's desires (we were just 5), and we had a wonderful meal together at the end of the day to celebrate our new found friendships and understandings. Kenan was the best tour guide - warm, welcoming, articulate and so very knowledgeable.
tripAdvisorTestimonials.company_response: Dear Stephanie,nnWow, I'm speechless and really honored to hear these beautiful words, I really felt like we became one huge family in the end, just like you said. To hear that comment about not being a 'canned' tour is simply music to my ears since I really don't like those types of tours and I love doing my best to make it as personal and modified to specific needs and interests as possible. I'm probably biased when I say this, but I can't express my gratitude enough for this highly detailed and deep recommendation, just thank you! Send my regards to John and say Hi to your kids for me :)nnHope to see you again someday. Stay safe!nnTill next time,nKenan from Adventure in Bosnia team.
